reviewText: The vendor indicates that the Blu Ray is Region A / 1, (Region A/1: North America, Central America, South America, Japan, North Korea, South Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Southeast Asia)  but when I put the disc in my Blu Ray only voice is heard, but the picture is not seen; a waste of money invested. I advise you before buying, you take into account that the same may happen to you.
